name: Team Never Quit Podcast
what_you_do: The Team Never Quit Podcast features real-life stories of individuals who have faced significant challenges and transformed their lives, aiming to inspire others to do the same.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves a broad audience interested in personal development, resilience, and motivational stories, appealing to both individuals and groups seeking inspiration.
bio: Top 50 show in Education and awarded Best of iTunes Podcast in 2016.
business_focus: The Team Never Quit Podcast features real-life stories of individuals who have faced significant challenges and transformed their lives, aiming to inspire others to do the same.
